resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my-index-000001",
    settings={
        "analysis": {
            "analyzer": {
                "my_stop_analyzer": {
                    "type": "stop",
                    "stopwords": [
                        "the",
                        "over"
                    ]
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.indices.analyze(
    index="my-index-000001",
    analyzer="my_stop_analyzer",
    text="The 2 QUICK Brown-Foxes jumped over the lazy dog's bone.",
)
print(resp1)
